message: I just stumbled into your guides for async/await and this page after trying to figure out how asynchronicity works in C# after coming from a background in C++ where I was taught the low-level stuff (how to manage threads/mutexes/etc myself). Your guides have managed to clear up all of the misconceptions/confusion I was having with it! Your posts are the gold standard against which all other programming guides should be measured. Clear examples that cover best practices and the rationale behind those practices, edge cases, pitfalls, it's all here. Thanks so much for your work!
